Question
========
As the angle of an inclined plane increases, the parallel force _______ and the
perpendicular force _______.


Answerlist
----------
* decreases, decreases
* decreases, increases
* increases, decreases
* increases, increases


Solution
========
The parallel forces increases and the perpendicular force decreases.
